CampaignMemberStatus.name: CampaignMemberStatus
CampaignMemberStatus.description: One or more member status values defined for a campaign.

CampaignId.description: ID of the campaign associated with this member status.

HasResponded.description: Indicates whether this status is equivalent to “Responded” (true) or not (false). Beginning with API version 39.0, at least one CampaignMemberStatus on each campaign must have a hasResponded value of true.

IsDefault.description: Indicates whether this status is the default status (true) or not (false). Beginning with API version 39.0, there must be a default CampaignMemberStatus defined for every campaign.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

Label.description: Label for the status in the picklist. Limited to 765 characters.

SortOrder.description: Unique number order where this campaign member status appears in the picklist.
